name: Rosemary Garlic Rub
author: Christopher Anderson
summary: This olive oil based rub is great on chicken or pork, particularly when using an indirect grilling method. You can also use this on potatoes. To coat potatoes, cut small baking potatoes into eighths and par boil for about 5 minutes. Coat with mixture and place directly on medium high grill rack, turning every five minutes, for about fifteen minutes, until tender.
directions: In a small bowl, mix black pepper, kosher salt, fresh rosemary, dried rosemary and garlic
Gradually stir in enough olive oil to form a thick paste
Rub into desired meats before grilling
